message:
SYSTEM: CharlaOEGBC.pdf: Página 32
Set your title here in Slide Master Options
Smart Contracts. Properties
32
Inherit blockchain properties
o Inmutability
• Once a Smart Contract is created, it can never be 
changed again
o Distributed
• The output of the contract is validated by everyone
The most important blockchain to process Smart 
Contracts is Ethereum
o It was created and designed to support Smart Contracts
speaker: SYSTEM
